# object

**Instance Property**

An object the change inserts or removes.

## Declaration

```swift
var object: Any? { get }
```

## Accessing the Change

- **changeType**: The type of change.
- **index**: The index location of the change.
- **associatedIndex**: When this property is set to a value other than [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSNotFound-9t5v2], the receiver is one half of a move, and this value is the index of the change’s counterpart of the opposite type in the diff.
